title: Liberty Christmas Production
desc:
Please join us on  December 13th  for a very special Christmas treat! 
 Enjoy a Christmas performance by Liberty Kids, carols, cocoa, Christmas cookies, and more! 
 There is no admission fee, but please reserve a seat for you and a loved one here. 
 Also, our children are partnering with Liberty City to make the holiday a happy one for children in NYC. Please consider bringing a new, unwrapped toy that will be given to families in need, so their children will have a gift to open Christmas morning.
